```julia

julia> x1 = rand(2)
2-element Array{Float64,1}:
 0.5908446386657102
 0.7667970365022592

julia> Random.seed!(1234);

julia> x2 = rand(2)
2-element Array{Float64,1}:
 0.5908446386657102
 0.7667970365022592

julia> x1 == x2
true

julia> x1 .== x2

 1
 1
```
